title: DO-08-024: Discretionary Trusts
summary:
OGE provides guidance concerning the treatment of income beneficiaries of discretionary trusts, for purposes of the disqualification requirements of 18 U.S.C. § 208 as well as the financial disclosure requirements of section 13104(f)(1) of the Ethics in Government Act, 5 U.S.C. 

Notes: [The guidance in this advisory was updated in 2013 by Legal Advisory LA-13-04.]
